title: Maces
content: Weapon Enchantment +1 Diamondsbane: If an adamantine weapon hits anobject, the hit is always critical. Lethal Weapon: This weapon ignores BludgeoningResistance. Concussive Smash Infernal Mace 1d6 +2 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +2 Infernal Weapon: On a hit, the affected entity deals an additional 3 Poison damage and can possibly Poison its target. Concussive Smash Shattered Flail 1d6 +2 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +2 Yeenoghu's Gift: Dealing damage with this weapon heals the wielder for 1d
